text: Lockport is a city in Niagara County, New York, United States. The population was 20,876 at the 2020 census. It is so named from a set of Erie Canal locks (Lock Numbers 34 and 35) within the city. Lockport is the county seat of Niagara County. It is part of the Buffaloâ€“Niagara Falls Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==References== Category:Cities in New York (state) Category:County seats in New York (state)
title: Lockport, New York
